author: Manisha Krishnan, Sarah Berman, Natasha Grzincic
title: They Live in the US, But These Canadians Are Fleeing Home Due to Coronavirus
description: VICE spoke to Canadians who left behind their lives in the US because they're scared of how the pandemic is being handled there. "It’s quite shocking."
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE Canada.
Like many Canadians in a creative field, Megan Wilson had long dreamed of living in New York City. 
Wilson, 34, went to Ryerson University in Toronto and since 2011 has spent various stints in the U.S., for s… [+7703 chars]
